keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
Additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Hastings & Rye. Across the whole constituency schools are having their budgets cut.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union
issues.education: Opposing school cuts. Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Hastings & Rye. Across the whole constituency schools are having their budgets cut.
issues.health: Standing up for the NHS. We need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.

community.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Hastings & Rye.
